item.title: Jimmy Carter’s humanitarian legacy always included women’s rights
item.description: Carter championed the Equal Rights Amendment and appointed women to the federal bench.

item.title: How HR leaders can help employees affected by the Los Angeles wildfires
item.description: Setting up clear lines of communication, allowing worker flexibility, and helping affected employees access life-saving benefits are some basic moves.

item.title: Airbnb’s nonprofit wing helps LA fire victims find shelter, CFO says ‘right thing to do’
item.description: "In these moments of real stress for community members, we can mobilize our hosts," Ellie Mertz says.

item.title: Taiwan chip giant TSMC says its 2024 revenue rose more than 33% on soaring demand for AI technology
